summary: The module implements a set of in‑memory cache utilities used by the asynchronous websocket client. It provides a generic base cache and several specialized array‑backed caches that store data by size limits, symbols, identifiers, order sides or timestamps, as well as a delegate proxy for transparent attribute forwarding.
business_intent: Enable fast, incremental storage and retrieval of real‑time exchange data (e.g., order books, trades, ticker updates) in asynchronous trading applications built on the CCXT library.
